channel.title: Mean Girls on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Mean Girls on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Watch Out ‘Mean Girls,’ It Seems Oct. 3 Is Now Taylor Swift’s Day
item.description: The pop superstar revealed her 12th album, ‘The Life of a Showgirl,’ will drop on Oct. 3, which has also been dubbed ‘Mean Girls’ Day.
